Title: Provides for a tax check-off box on tax returns for gifts to the New York state horse retirement and rescue fund; and directs the commissioner of agriculture to compile a list of approved rescue programs
Summary: Provides for a tax check-off box on personal income tax and corporate franchise tax returns for gifts to the New York state horse retirement and rescue fund; and directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets to compile a list of approved horse retirement and rescue programs.
LawCode: Add §§209-M & 625-a, Tax L; add §95-j, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to providing a tax check-off box on personal income tax and corporate franchise tax returns for gifts to the New York state horse retirement and rescue fund; and directing the commissioner of agriculture and markets to compile a list of approved horse retirement and rescue programs
